result.eng: The murder happened at the beginning of the chapter.
result.ga: Ag tús na caibidle a tharla an dúnmharú
result.orig: Ag tús na caibidle a tharla an dúnmharú
result.html: Ag tús na caibidle a tharla an dúnmharúThe murder happened at the beginning of the chapter.
result.ponchtml: Ag tús na caibidle a ṫarla an dúnṁarúThe murder happened at the beginning of the chapter.

result.eng: It's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.
result.ga: Is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad alt
result.orig: Is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad alt
result.html: Is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad altIt's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ an scéal bleaċtaireaċta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnṁarú sa ċéad altIt's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.

result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.orig: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.html: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ponchtml: Deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an Uaċtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: Very few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ga: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin
result.orig: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin
result.html: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ponchtml: Is beag duine ar doṁan gur cuiṁin leis lá an ḋúnṁaraiṫe sinVery few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
